Neil McCauley.Action: Described as an ice-cold professional, very careful and very good, with an obsessively functional lifestyle and no steady relationships.
Precise language and professionalism suggest reliability within his parameters.
Runs a professional crew that pulls down high line, high number scores using any necessary method; is very careful and very good.
Maintains an obsessively functional lifestyle with no encumbrances, able to walk away from anything in 30 seconds flat.
Exits a bus, examines ambulances without hesitation, and swiftly climbs into one and drives off, suggesting possible theft.
